mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order`(order_number, order_type, order_status, tenant_id, agent_id, total_amount, discount_amount, payable_amount, paid_amount, paid_type, create_user_id, last_update_user_id, last_update_remark) VALUES (#{orderNumber}, #{orderType}, #{orderStatus}, #{tenantId}, #{agentId}, #{totalAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{payableAmount}, #{paidAmount}, #{paidType}, #{createUserId}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{lastUpdateRemark})
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET order_number = #{orderNumber}, order_type = #{orderType}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, tenant_id = #{tenantId}, agent_id = #{agentId}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, discount_amount = #{discountAmount}, payable_amount = #{payableAmount}, paid_amount = #{paidAmount}, paid_type = #{paidType}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, last_update_user_id = #{lastUpdateUserId}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT order.id AS order_id, order.tenant_id, order_detail.branch_id, goods.id AS goods_id, goods.metering_mode, goods_specification.id AS goods_specification_id, goods_specification.renewal_time FROM `order` INNER JOIN order_detail ON order.id = order_detail.order_id AND order_detail.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN goods ON order_detail.goods_id = goods.id AND goods.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN goods_specification ON order_detail.goods_specification_id = goods_specification.id AND goods_specification.deleted = 0 WHERE order.id = #{orderId} AND order.deleted = 0
